episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch00:
Steven invited [Name:PlayerNickname ] to go
stone hunting together...

and told [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] many interesting stories
about stones.
Thanks for coming with me today.

In return, I can join you in doing something you
like next time.

Do you have something you’re passionate about,
like I am with stones?
(Say you have lots of hobbies)
Wonderful! It’s good to have many hobbies.
(Say you don’t have any hobbies)
No need to think too hard about it.

Finding interest in something will broaden
your world.

It’d be great if you could look at the world from
different points of view and let your unique
potential grow.

Actually, there’s something I noticed recently by
changing my perspective.

Collecting stones and polishing my skills as
a Trainer...

Why does my passion gravitate toward these
two things?

I realized that the answer has something to do
with all those shooting stars that shine
so brightly.

That reminds me! I heard we’ll be able to see a
meteor shower soon. Would you like to watch it
with me?
Let’s speak again then.

[Name:PlayerNickname ] watched the meteor
shower with Steven...
Stars are like dreams running through space.
But I don’t think I can add them to my collection.
Do you know why shooting stars shine?

Put simply, a lost object from space collides with
this planet’s atmosphere...
and creates a phenomenon that lights it up!
Light is created by a strong collision...

It’s kind of similar to when skilled Trainers go
head-to-head, don’t you think?
That shine is what I enjoy.

Maybe the reason I keep honing my skills as a
Trainer is because I want to find an unpolished
gemstone to shine together with.

I enjoy battles against challengers who have huge
potential, despite being rough around the edges...
and looking for stones that excite my curiosity.

My interests in those two things are actually
quite similar, now that I think about it!

Am I seeking out new encounters that will expand
my world?

Interacting with you is what prompted this question
in my mind.

I’ve traveled across various regions and have met
many young Trainers I would call unpolished
gemstones.
And even amongst them, you...

You looked like a star in the night, shining together
with all of your friends.
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
I know you shine in a way that only you can.

I want you to polish up your potential and keep
on shining!
(Nod confidently)
I’ll be looking forward to seeing how you’ll shine.

(Say you’ll shine like he’s never
seen before)

Just like the stones I enjoy collecting?
Heh heh. Interesting!

As an adult, and also as a Trainer who’s been
around longer than you...
I’ll keep giving you my support!
